title: Secure website question
content: I was visiting a web page to make a payment and on the web page where you enter your credit/debit card details the page was not secure but when I tried with the edge browser the page was secure. Is their any way to fix this for Firefox browser?

title: Login To Google Popup
content:
Hi all. Some websites creates a little popup window in the top right corner of my browser "Log into your Google account" and I cannot figure how to make this PERMANENTLY stop doing it. I just click the "X" to avoid doing so, but I wish to have this stop happening before uninstalling my Firefox browser completely. I'm here only because I have lost patience with that feature and lost patience trying to figure out how to stop it. Please, help, anyone. Thank you.

(image attached)
creator: hap317

title: Problema con Extension Firefox FVD 16.2.9
content: Hola, Desde hace bastante tiempo vengo utilizando Flash Video Downloader 16.2.9 (FVD) "artur.dubovoy@gmail.com.xpi" (extension de firefox) para bajar casi cualquier video de internet. Es la mejor extension para firefox para bajar video que he usado, ya que en determinados videos (los que se van bajando a trocitos) los va almacenando temporalmente y al terminar los une en un solo .mp4. Pero desde hace un par de meses, SOLO veo "CONVERT" donde antes ponia "DOWNLOAD". Al dar en "CONVERT" me dice que instale un modulo "FVD_Downloader_Module_1.0.8.msi", pero aun instalandole me sigue apareciendo "CONVERT" y no puedo descargar el video. Necesito saber como volver a poder descargar esos videos que se van descargando a trocitos con extension .M4s como por ejemplo el: https://www.rtve.es/play/videos/lazos-de-sangre/mecano/6940737/ O sea, que vuelva a aparecer "Download" en vez de "Convert" en todos los videos. Muchas gracias.
creator: pedroperezruiz

title: sekme taşıma problemi
content: İyi günler, android telefonumu değiştirdim, ama orda açık kalan sekmeleri yeni cihaza yada bilgisayara taşımak istediğimde bunu yapamıyorum, eski cihazdaki sekmeler görünüyor ama onları taşıyamıyorum yada ordan alamıyorum, bilgisayara veya yeni telefonuma taşımayı yada tüm sekmeleri toplu şekilde kaydetmeyi nasıl yapabilirim.

title: When I click link in email or other ddocument my Firefox home page opens
content:
I am running the Firefox 117.0 browser on my MacBook Pro that is running macOS 13.5.1.

This problem has just started, possibly when I recently updated to Firefox 117.0.

When I click on a link in an email or another document my Firefox home page opens. I have to go back to the link and click it a second time to get the desired webpage to open.

This is...well...annoying; and it wastes time.

Any thoughts or advice would be appreciated.
creator: canyonlight

title: FF does not open external links if not already running
content:
Hello, since recently when I click on links in external programs like mail or shortcuts, etc... Firefox starts up but does not open the link. If Firefox is already running the links open normally. I never had this issue before and I have it on my 2 computers. Firefox is synced to both computers but different OS. (no problems on ios) I tried to disable all extension : no change.

I am on MAC OS 12.6.3 or 13.3.1 Firefox 117.0
creator: ff107

title: How can modify options in FireFox by CMD?
content: I need a command in Windows that sets true this "security.enterprise_roots.enabled" in Firefox. Any hint can be good. thanks
creator: fsdsds

title: Moving firefox profile: No response / no effect
content:
I’m having trouble moving firefox to a new computer. I copy the files, expecting to see my existing set up with bookmarks, extensions, and passwords, and I get no response, no errors, just completely fresh firefox.

Both systems are on arch linux and both running Firefox 117.0. I completely close both firefox. I copy ~/.mozilla/firefox to an ext4 thumb drive from my old computer. on the new computer, I delete the existing ~/.mozilla/firefox. I copy the files from the thumb drive to /firefox/. I restart firefox. unmodified firefox

I’ve also tried chowing the files. and also chmoding 700 and 755 (advice from old stackoverflow threads) ive tried chowing and chmoding. Each time i restart the whole process for posterity. Still no response

I’m dumbfounded as to why it’s not working, and I don’t even know where to look now
creator: steve.flumph.2

title: I cannot access my email account.
content: For some reason, I cannot access my email account. Previously, at various times it shows someone else is on my account. How can I prevent that also?

title: Problem opening Firefox
content: Previously when I opened up Firefox it would go directly to my homepage. Now when I attempt to open it up I have to provide info and get permission on my cellphone. Why is this happening and how can I get it to work as it did before?
creator: mrsammy7

title: EVERY TIME I CLOSE MY BROWSER FIREFOX CLOSES ALL MY TABS
content:
WHENEVER i NEED TO CLOSE MY BROWSER FIREFOX ERASES ALL MY TABS. I MUST USE CCLEANER THAT USES THE QUESTION - THIS IS TAKING TOO LONG, DO YOU WANT TO FORCE CLOSE? (BECAUSE CCLEANER NEEDS TO CLOSE FIREFOX TO CLEAN COOKIES) AND THEN THAT WAY IS THE ONLY WAY TO HAVE ALL MY TABS BACK. BUT THERE ARE TIMES THAT TABS GET CLOSE SUDDENLY AND I LOOSE ALL MY TABS. 

THIS MEANS THAT THE WAY FIREFOX CLOSES THE TABS IS FAR FROM GOOD, AND THEY CAUSE TO CLOSE ALL TABS, OR THEY JUST HAVE NO IDEA HOW TO DO IT RIGHT.

DO YOU KNOW ANY WAY TO CONTACT MOZILLA OR FIREFOX TO REPORT THE PROBLEM? IT IS A SHAME THAT A BROWSER DOES NOT OFFER FREE TECH SUPPORT- AND I CANNOT EVEN TELL THEM!!
creator: ldubcovsky
